quote_last: but he had left the ball at the same time as I did, and had further to travel.
quote_raw: It was 1.08 a.m. but he had left the ball at the same time as I did, and had further to travel.
title: The Rosie Project
author: Graeme Simsion

quote_last: when I hear footsteps on the stairs, the pause, the timid knock-knock-knock on my outer door.
quote_raw: My radio-alarm is glowing 01:08 when I hear footsteps on the stairs, the pause, the timid knock-knock-knock on my outer door.
title: The Bone Clocks
author: David Mitchell
